about.description: After 23 years in tech, I followed my passion and became a certified Triathlon Instructor and Personal Fitness Coach. I specialize in performance and rehab coaching—helping athletes prepare for triathlons, Ironman, MTB races, and marathons, as well as guiding people through recovery and strength-building after injury. My goal: to help you train smarter, recover stronger, and live better.

offers.title: Personal Training Program After Injury
offers.description:
Personal and close guidance throughout the process
Strengthening the body, improving range of motion and flexibility
Gradual return to general fitness
Weekly customized plan in TP software
Ongoing WhatsApp communication for questions and adjustments

offers.title: Personal Cycling Training Program
offers.description:
Personal and close guidance throughout the process

Cycling technique and control workouts
Weekly customized plan in TP software
Ongoing WhatsApp communication for questions and adjustments

offers.title: Personal Triathlon Training Program
offers.description:
Personal and close guidance throughout the process
Training for all three disciplines (swimming, cycling, and running)
Open water swimming practice and transition training
Weekly customized plan in TP software
Ongoing WhatsApp communication for questions and adjustments

questions.question: How does the training method work?
questions.answer:
A personal and professional plan tailored to the athlete’s goals
Ongoing weekly communication
Workout analysis and constant feedback using advanced technology
Briefings before races and important workouts

questions.question: Who are the trainings for?
questions.answer:
Beginner triathletes with basic knowledge
Professional triathletes who want to improve their performance and reach new heights
Cyclists of all levels
Athletes who want to recover from injury effectively
